## Install

```bash
$ npm i bigbrother-webpack-plugin -D
```

## Usage

```bash
const BigBrother = require('bigbrother-webpack-plugin');

module.exports = function(webpackConfig) {
  webpackConfig.plugins.push(new BigBrother({
    cwd: process.cwd(),
    tool: {
      name: 'your tool',
      version: '0.0.x',
    },
    stagesPath: '',
    buildConfig: {},
  }));
  return webpackConfig;
};
```
